caption:
Now in Kyoto—the twin city of Florence, where Gucci was founded—Gucci Cosmos traces the House’s over 100-year history and creative legacy while celebrating 60 years of Gucci in Japan. Six immersive rooms explore how for over a century Gucci’s abiding codes and spirit have been brought to life in its most iconic pieces, and how these era-defining classics have forever inspired and been reinterpreted by the House’s design visionaries.

Attending the opening of the exhibition were Global Brand Ambassador Jun Shison, Yoasobi, Juri Ueno, Meisa Kuroki, and Jun Hasegawa.

Discover the exhibition at Kyoto City KYOCERA Museum of Art until December 1, 2024.
